channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large quantity of refuse being dumped behind bus stop bench, 22nd July
item.description:
There is an accumulation of rubbish dumped behind the hedge adjoining the bus stop bench on Lansdown Road. There is no rubbish bin serving this stop. Amongst the rubbish there is food waste from takeaways which attracts vermin.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lansdown Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Extensive weed growth, 22nd July
item.description:
Footpath opposite 12 Guise Avenue, Brockworth

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Guise Avenue, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Yet more fly tipping, 22nd July
item.description:
The white table and pile of clothes arrived overnight. This is the THIRD time this week that rubbish has been dumped here. Why do you do nothing to prevent this constantly happening or to catch those people responsible?? Fly tipping is a criminal offence.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66, Pates Avenue, Alstone, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sick Wellingtonia, Californian Redwood Tree, Basset Close - Delavale Road, Winchcombe, 22nd July
item.description:
The condition of the tree is deteriorating since it was last reported in December 2023. It is still shedding. The tree has a reference number see photo. Local resident think the tag was attached possibly in the 1970â€™s when the Delavale Estate was built, and these significant trees were given protection. Location //snowballs.money.orbited https://w3w.co/snowballs.money.orbited

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bassett Close, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: Bus stop very faded, 22nd July
item.description:
Bus stop paint almost obliterated. Please could it be repainted to stop people parking there.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35, Charlton Lane, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 22nd July
